txt.en: 'This is very troubling, [placeholder]. I will stay here and try to find Glenneth. You must continue on without me. If this is what I think it is, the Beornings are in grave danger.'
TBD
'Signs of a struggle. Be alert, [placeholder].'
Investigate poisoned root
Thorlind can be called back to your side should you get separated.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
TBD
Thorlind can be found on the path south of Felegoth.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
TBD
Investigate blood
There are more prints in the path here
Talk to Thorlind
The Beornings headed west, towards The Forest Gate.\n\nYou should follow the Beornings' trail.
Found Beorning prints ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Thorlind
Search for the Beornings' trail
There are signs of a struggle here
'There! Tracks! Boots, the size of a large Man. Signs of a wagon, pulled by a hoofed animal, probably a horse. This is likely them.'
'More tracks. We are getting closer.'
'I believe this is Glenneth's blood. Something must have ambushed her.'
'Hmm. They leave the path, quickly. And then, the boot prints become bear prints! Something is wrong. Let us pursue.'
The Beornings suddenly ran into the woods, north of the path.\n\nYou should search for a clue to discover their whereabouts.
You have found the scene of a struggle north of the path.\n\nYou should investigate the scene.
A root lies on the ground, its tip dripping with an unknown poison
Beorning travellers and an Elf scout are missing in the forest. You have joined Thorlind in Eryn Lasgalen to search for them.

'I believe Glenneth was attacked while she was tracking the Beornings, likely by the same thing that spooked their horse into the woods. It is as I suspected; something dangerous is out here with us.'
Tracking the Lost
You see prints in the path ahead
'This is Glenneth's bow! She would not have parted with it unless forced.'
Follow the Beornings' trail
A bow of Elven make lies on the ground
Follow the path west and search for some sign of the Beornings.\n\nYou should search for the Beornings' trail.
Search for Beorning prints ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Beornings headed west, towards The Forest Gate.\n\nYou should search for Beorning prints.
TBD
Whose blood is this?
Search for a clue
Investigate Elven bow
'This is where the missing parties began their journey. Follow their footsteps by taking the path west. With keen eyes and ears, perhaps we will discover where they veered off course.'
'This is poisoned. I have seen this poison before, but not for a very long time....'
TBD

'When you are ready, we will depart. We will begin by searching for any signs of the Beornings or their cart. Do not fear, I will accompany you into the depths of the forest.'\n\nHe flashes a smile at you, and you can tell he said that mainly in jest.
